```{r}
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}
sample<-read.csv('../shotgun_files/tblASVsamples.csv', header = TRUE)
genes<-read.csv('../shotgun_files/vfdbTbl_2021.csv', header = TRUE)
```

```{r}
n_distinct(sample$AccessionShotgun)
distinct(genes,Genome)

#get samples that has E.coli
genes.df<-filter(genes,grepl('Escherichia',Genome))
genes.df2<-genes.df%>%
  distinct(SampleID)

dat<-left_join(genes.df2,sample,by="SampleID")
dat2<-dat%>%
  select(SampleID:AccessionShotgun)%>%
  distinct(SampleID,.keep_all = TRUE)%>%
  pull(AccessionShotgun)

write(dat2,'../shotgun_files/SRR_shotgun.txt')

```
